isInitializedDescription: Boolean function that returns if the map was initialized
initMapDescription: Function that initializes the map on the screen
typeMap:
Map type: Select which map to display.
  • Map: Displays the vector map highlighting streets and locations.
  • Hybrid: Displays the map by satellite photos highlighting streets and locations.
  • Satellite: Displays the map by satellite photos without detachments
  • Terrain: Displays the vector map highlighting terrain, streets and locations.
centerPoint: Central point: Defines the center point based on geographic coordinates.
zoom:
zoom: Determines the approximation of the map.
  • Location: Approach at the level of a locality or construction;
  • Street: Approach at street level or
  • City: Approach at city level.
centralizeMapDescription: Function that centralizes the map in the coordinates
setAdvancedMapOptionsDescription: Function that inserts advanced options into the map in JSON format. These options can be found in the GoogleMaps API documentation.
advancedOptions: Advanced options: Lets you add advanced options.
createMarkerDescription: Function that creates a marker on the map
markerId: Marker Id: Marker identifier on the map.
title: Title: marker title.
point: Point: Set point to start marker.
setAdvancedMarkerOptionsDescription: Function that inserts advanced options into the marker. These options can be found in the GoogleMaps API documentation.
changeMapZoomDescription: Function that zooms in on the map
createAutoCompleteDescription: Function that completes the typed address
searchType:
Type of search: Limits searches based on the following features.
  • Address: Defines address-based searches;
  • Establishment: Defines searches based on names of locations or establishments or
  • Geocoding: Defines searches based on geographic coordinates.
searchBounds: Search bounds: Determines the search for a defined area.
isStrictSearch: Search strict?: Defines whether the query will be restricted in the vicinity of a region.
createLatLngPointDescription: Function that informs the latitude and longitude of a point
createLatLngBoundsDescription: A function that defines the area of a rectangle from two points
southWestPoint: West-South point: Sets the point on the West-South end of the map.
northEastPoint: East-North point: Sets the point on the East-North end of the map.
drawCircleDescription: Function that draws a circular area on the map
radiusInMeters: Radius size: Radius of the circle in meters.
fillColor: Fill color: Sets the color to be filled inside the area.
strokeColor: Stroke color: Defines the color of the area outline.
fillOpacity: Opacity of filling: Opacity of fill (values between 0 and 1).
drawRectangleDescription: Function that draws a rectangular area on the map
bounds: Bounds: Determines the search for a defined area.
drawLineDescription: Function that draws a line on the map
coordsPath: Coordinate address: Defines multiple points in sequence.
drawPolygonDescription: Function that draws a circular area on the map
strokeOpacity: Stroke opacity: Degree of opacity of the contour (values between 0 and 1).
geocoderDescription: Function that gets the geographical coordinates
requestAdvancedOptions: Advanced options: Allows the addition of extra options.
getPropertyFromGeocoderDescription: Function that gets the properties of the geographical coordinates
directRequest: Route requisition: Sets the route requirement created.
createRequestDirectionDescription: Function that creates a request of a route
originPoint: Origin point: Sets the source coordinates.
travelMode:
Travel mode: Informs which means of transport used on the route
  • Driving
  • Transit
  • walking
  • Bicycling
drawRouteDescription: Function that draws a route on the map
directionResultItem: Direction route Item: Sets the direction of the route.
